Package org.wmn4j.mir.discovery

Class GeometricPatternDiscovery

java.lang.Object
org.wmn4j.mir.discovery.GeometricPatternDiscovery
All Implemented Interfaces:
PatternDiscovery
public final class GeometricPatternDiscovery extends Object implements PatternDiscovery
Implements repeated pattern discovery using point set representation of music and compression ratio of repeated patterns with the SIATECHF algorithm [1].

[1] Bj√∂rklund, Otso. Improving the running time of repeated pattern discovery in multidimensional representations of music. Master's thesis, University of Helsinki. 2015. https://helda.helsinki.fi/handle/10138/273479

NOTE: The current implementation of GeometricPatternDiscovery is not thread-safe. The SIATECHF algorithm also has quadratic space complexity so running this on large scores will require a very large heap size.

  • Method Details

    • withSiatechf

      public static PatternDiscovery withSiatechf(Score score, double compressionRatio)
      Returns the results of running pattern discovery with SIATECHF algorithm.

      SIATECHF works by constructing a point set representation of the given score and finding maximal translatable patterns and their translational equivalence classes. Only those equivalence classes are returned whose compression ratio exceeds the given value.

      Compression ratio is the number of notes covered by the occurrences of the pattern divided the number of points required to represent all the pattern occurrences. Patterns whose occurrences have little overlap, consists of multiple notes and occur frequently have high compression ratio values. It is recommended to avoid values less than 2.0 for compression ratio as otherwise a large number of uninteresting repeated patterns will be returned. Using compression ratio 0.0 will return all translational equivalence classes in the point set representation and values smaller than 0.0 are not defined.

      Parameters:
      score - the score for which repeated pattern discovery is performed
      compressionRatio - the required non-negative minimum compression ratio for the returned patterns
      Returns:
      the results of running pattern discovery with SIATECH algorithm

    • getPatternPositions

      public Collection<Collection<PatternPosition>> getPatternPositions()
      Description copied from interface: PatternDiscovery
      Returns the positions of the repeated patterns found by this pattern discovery.

      Each returned collection of positions contains all positions of occurrences of the same or similar pattern found by this pattern discovery.
